Package.Name: Smart Buildings Launch Pad
Package.Description: A smart building launch pad containing a dashboard auto-populated with emulated data or sensor data and weather forecast data from multiple APIs. Also includes a Freeboard dashboard to view emulated or device data auto-populated from IoT Ensemble APIs.

Basic.Name: Smart Buildings Launch Pad
Basic.Description: A smart building launch pad containing a dashboard auto-populated with emulated data or sensor data and weather forecast data from multiple APIs. Also includes a Freeboard dashboard to view emulated or device data auto-populated from IoT Ensemble APIs.
